h3cHPEOC.name: h3cHPEOC
h3cHPEOC.contactinfo: SMB EOC Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. 310 Liuhe Road, Zhijiang Science Park, Hangzhou, P.R.China http://www.h3c.com Zip:310053.
h3cHPEOC.description: The objects in this MIB module are used to manage and display current configuration of Ethernet Over Cable Network (EOC) which based on HomePlug(HP) AV Specification.

h3cHPEOCCltVlanType.name: h3cHPEOCCltVlanType
h3cHPEOCCltVlanType.description: Control EOC CLT's VLAN type, ieee8021q : 802.1q VLAN mode, portbased : portbased VLAN mode.

h3cHPEOCCltVlanManTable.name: h3cHPEOCCltVlanManTable
h3cHPEOCCltVlanManTable.description: This table implements the management of CLT(Coax Line Terminal) VLAN.

h3cHPEOCCltVlanManEntry.name: h3cHPEOCCltVlanManEntry
h3cHPEOCCltVlanManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cHPEOCCltVlanManTable.

h3cHPEOCCltEthPortType.name: h3cHPEOCCltEthPortType
h3cHPEOCCltEthPortType.description: Control CLT ethernet ports' type, normal : port which used for normal translation, debug : port which used for debug.

h3cHPEOCCltSysManTable.name: h3cHPEOCCltSysManTable
h3cHPEOCCltSysManTable.description: This table implements the management of CLT(Coax Line Terminal).

h3cHPEOCCltSysManEntry.name: h3cHPEOCCltSysManEntry
h3cHPEOCCltSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cHPEOCCltSysManTable.

h3cHPEOCCltFwVersion.name: h3cHPEOCCltFwVersion
h3cHPEOCCltFwVersion.description: EOC firmware version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cHPEOCCnuSysManTable.name: h3cHPEOCCnuSysManTable
h3cHPEOCCnuSysManTable.description: This table implements the management of CNUs.

h3cHPEOCCnuSysManEntry.name: h3cHPEOCCnuSysManEntry
h3cHPEOCCnuSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cHPEOCCnuSysManTable.

h3cHPEOCCnuBcastControl.name: h3cHPEOCCnuBcastControl
h3cHPEOCCnuBcastControl.description: Broadcast storm suppression status. true(1) - Broadcast storm suppression enable. false(2) - Broadcast storm suppression disable.

h3cHPEOCCnuAnonymStatus.name: h3cHPEOCCnuAnonymStatus
h3cHPEOCCnuAnonymStatus.description: Anonymity status. true(1) - the user which uses the CNU is anonymous. false(2) - the user which uses the CNU has an account.

h3cHPEOCCnuMacLimit.name: h3cHPEOCCnuMacLimit
h3cHPEOCCnuMacLimit.description: Configure the max number of MAC address entries which can access through the CNU, it ranges from 1 to 8. Otherwise, If configure 0, the CNU won't limit the MAC address entry. If configure 0xFF, it means no MAC address entry can access the CNU.

h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgrade.name: h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgrade
h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgrade.description: Auto upgrade Status. true(1) - The firmware of the CNU will be auto changed by CLT. false(2)- The firmware of the CNU will not be auto changed.

h3cHPEOCOnLineCnuNumber.name: h3cHPEOCOnLineCnuNumber
h3cHPEOCOnLineCnuNumber.description: The total number of the online CNU(s).

h3cHPEOCOffLineCnuNumber.name: h3cHPEOCOffLineCnuNumber
h3cHPEOCOffLineCnuNumber.description: The total number of the offline CNU(s).

h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgradeType.name: h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgradeType
h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgradeType.description: Type of auto upgrade status. It depends on h3cHPEOCCltAutoUpgrade status. flash - The CLT auto upgrade the firmware inside its flash to the CNUs. ftp - First download the firmware from FTP server to the CLT, then the CLT auto upgrade the firmware to the CNUs. tftp - First download the firmware from TFTP server to the CLT, then the CLT auto upgrade the firmware to the CNUs.

h3cHPEOCServerAddress.name: h3cHPEOCServerAddress
h3cHPEOCServerAddress.description: The address of remote host acting as server for operation. The default value is 0.0.0.0

h3cHPEOCServerUser.name: h3cHPEOCServerUser
h3cHPEOCServerUser.description: When using ftp to transfer files, the user name must be specified through this node. It contains 1 to 30 characters.

h3cHPEOCServerPassword.name: h3cHPEOCServerPassword
h3cHPEOCServerPassword.description: Remote user password for copying via ftp protocol. Optionally, this object may be ignored for protocols other than ftp. It contains 1 to 31 characters.

h3cHPEOCCableInfoTable.name: h3cHPEOCCableInfoTable
h3cHPEOCCableInfoTable.description: This table defines the primary parameters of the cable information.

h3cHPEOCCableInfoEntry.name: h3cHPEOCCableInfoEntry
h3cHPEOCCableInfoEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cHPEOCCableInfoTable.

h3cHPEOCFECErrors.name: h3cHPEOCFECErrors
h3cHPEOCFECErrors.description: The cable port's FEC bits errors ratio. FEC means the payload Forward Error Correction. It's a technology of controlling errors. Packets in transmission is checked by the receiver, if error occurs, the receiver will announce the sender to resend.

h3cHPEOCAvgBitsPerCarrier.name: h3cHPEOCAvgBitsPerCarrier
h3cHPEOCAvgBitsPerCarrier.description: The cable port's average bits per carrier.

h3cHPEOCAvgSNRPerCarrier.name: h3cHPEOCAvgSNRPerCarrier
h3cHPEOCAvgSNRPerCarrier.description: The cable port's signal noise ratio(SNR) bits per carrier.

h3cHPEOCAvgInPBCRCErrors.name: h3cHPEOCAvgInPBCRCErrors
h3cHPEOCAvgInPBCRCErrors.description: The input PB CRC errors on average.

h3cHPEOCInTotalPkts.name: h3cHPEOCInTotalPkts
h3cHPEOCInTotalPkts.description: The total number of packets(including bad packets) received on this interface.

h3cHPEOCAvgOutPower.name: h3cHPEOCAvgOutPower
h3cHPEOCAvgOutPower.description: The cable port's power sent on average, the unit is db.

h3cHPEOCAvgOutPBCRCErrors.name: h3cHPEOCAvgOutPBCRCErrors
h3cHPEOCAvgOutPBCRCErrors.description: The cable port's physical block(PB) cyclic redundancy check(CRC) errors sent on average.

h3cHPEOCOutTotalPkts.name: h3cHPEOCOutTotalPkts
h3cHPEOCOutTotalPkts.description: The total count of the packets(including bad packets) sent on this interface.

h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolTable.name: h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolTable
h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolTable.description: This table defines the bits per symbol parameters of the cable line.

h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolEntry.name: h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolEntry
h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbolTable.

h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbol.name: h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbol
h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbol.description: h3cHPEOCBitPerSymbol returns all the bits per symbol on the fixed frequency. Each 4 bits stand for one value, all the values picking-up will make up a cable bit map.
